item.description:
We did this last Fall and really enjoyed it. There are several nice long trails around the pond and lots of places to explore.

Please join us for a nice afternoon hiking in the woods and around the clear waters of this lovely area.

We may head over to Holidays Restaurant for a little nosh after the hike.

Please remember to bring bug spray, water for yourself and your pup, and a good sense of humor.

Rain will cancel this hike.
item.how_to_find_us: Plunk will be the beagle screaming "heyyyy over here !!! "

group.name: Human Soles & Doggie Paws Hikers & Walkers of Manchester, NH

item.name: Tower Hill Pond Dam - Hiking with Pups and Peeps
